info.description: API for submitting/monitoring jobs to/from an execution machine
info.title: Uspace API

get.description: Admin operations for applications: retrieve, insert, update, delete.

parameters.description: Comma-separated application IDs to fetch or delete
parameters.name: ids

200.description: Success with application(s) content or status

put.description: Admin operations for applications: retrieve, insert, update, delete.

parameters.description: Comma-separated application IDs to fetch or delete
parameters.name: ids

200.description: Success with application(s) content or status

post.description: Admin operations for applications: retrieve, insert, update, delete.

parameters.description: Comma-separated application IDs to fetch or delete
parameters.name: ids

200.description: Success with application(s) content or status

delete.description: Admin operations for applications: retrieve, insert, update, delete.

parameters.description: Comma-separated application IDs to fetch or delete
parameters.name: ids

200.description: Success with application(s) content or status

get.description: Handles CRUD operations for jobs. Supports multiple HTTP methods.

parameters.description: Filter jobs by single user ID
parameters.name: uid

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs to filter jobs
parameters.name: uids

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of job IDs to retrieve or delete
parameters.name: jids

parameters.description: Single job ID to retrieve or delete
parameters.name: jid

parameters.description: Job object for POST (single) and PUT
parameters.name: job

200.description: Success with job(s) content or status message

put.description: Handles CRUD operations for jobs. Supports multiple HTTP methods.

parameters.description: Filter jobs by single user ID
parameters.name: uid

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs to filter jobs
parameters.name: uids

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of job IDs to retrieve or delete
parameters.name: jids

parameters.description: Single job ID to retrieve or delete
parameters.name: jid

parameters.description: Job object for POST (single) and PUT
parameters.name: job

200.description: Success with job(s) content or status message

post.description: Handles CRUD operations for jobs. Supports multiple HTTP methods.

parameters.description: Filter jobs by single user ID
parameters.name: uid

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs to filter jobs
parameters.name: uids

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of job IDs to retrieve or delete
parameters.name: jids

parameters.description: Single job ID to retrieve or delete
parameters.name: jid

parameters.description: Job object for POST (single) and PUT
parameters.name: job

200.description: Success with job(s) content or status message

delete.description: Handles CRUD operations for jobs. Supports multiple HTTP methods.

parameters.description: Filter jobs by single user ID
parameters.name: uid

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs to filter jobs
parameters.name: uids

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of job IDs to retrieve or delete
parameters.name: jids

parameters.description: Single job ID to retrieve or delete
parameters.name: jid

parameters.description: Job object for POST (single) and PUT
parameters.name: job

200.description: Success with job(s) content or status message

post.description: Insert single or multiple user volume objects.

delete.description: Insert single or multiple user volume objects.

patch.description: Insert single or multiple user volume objects.

get.description: Retrieves or registers applications. Accepts queries or full application POST payloads.

parameters.description: Application name to fetch specific app
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Application version to fetch specific app
parameters.name: version

200.description: Success with application(s) content or status

post.description: Retrieves or registers applications. Accepts queries or full application POST payloads.

parameters.description: Application name to fetch specific app
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Application version to fetch specific app
parameters.name: version

200.description: Success with application(s) content or status

get.description: GET retrieves jobs by uid(s), jid, or returns all. POST submits one or multiple jobs.

parameters.description: Job ID or '*' for all jobs
parameters.name: jids

post.description: GET retrieves jobs by uid(s), jid, or returns all. POST submits one or multiple jobs.

parameters.description: Job ID or '*' for all jobs
parameters.name: jids

post.description: Copies a resource from one path to another using the `dest` query param in `bucket/object` format.

get.description: Downloads a single resource specified by the access context (must be a file, not a directory).

400.description: Bad request (e.g., target is a directory or vid is invalid)

500.description: Failed to access or stream the resource

post.description: Updates the group (group ID) of a resource based on its resource ID.
Moves a resource (copy + delete) to another bucket/object path using the `dest` query parameter.

400.description: Invalid destination format or missing destination

post.description: Updates the owner (user ID) of a resource based on its resource ID.
Updates permissions for a resource given its ID and a permission string.

get.description: Returns a byte-range preview (default 4KB) of a file resource. Assumes user is authorized.

delete.description: Deletes the resource specified by the access claim in the request context.

500.description: Internal server error or access claim missing

post.description: Uploads one or more files to a specified resource path from multipart form data.

get.description: Returns resources for a given access context. Supports list, tree, or content views.

parameters.description: Output structure: list, tree, or content
parameters.name: struct

get.description: GET to list volumes, POST to create one or more, DELETE to remove by vid

parameters.description: Volume ID to filter (GET) or delete (DELETE)
parameters.name: vid

put.description: GET to list volumes, POST to create one or more, DELETE to remove by vid

parameters.description: Volume ID to filter (GET) or delete (DELETE)
parameters.name: vid

post.description: GET to list volumes, POST to create one or more, DELETE to remove by vid

parameters.description: Volume ID to filter (GET) or delete (DELETE)
parameters.name: vid

delete.description: GET to list volumes, POST to create one or more, DELETE to remove by vid

parameters.description: Volume ID to filter (GET) or delete (DELETE)
parameters.name: vid

patch.description: GET to list volumes, POST to create one or more, DELETE to remove by vid

parameters.description: Volume ID to filter (GET) or delete (DELETE)
parameters.name: vid
